titles.en: Chapter 7 – Abhorrence of sitting by the inequitable judges

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ بَعْضِ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ قَالَ مَرَّ بِي أَبُو جَعْفَرٍ وَ أَبُو عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) وَ أَنَا جَالِسٌ عِنْدَ قَاضٍ بِالْمَدِينَةِ فَدَخَلْتُ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ الْغَدِ فَقَالَ لِي مَا مَجْلِسٌ رَأَيْتُكَ فِيهِ أَمْسِ قَالَ قُلْتُ لَهُ جُعِلْتُ فِدَاكَ إِنَّ هَذَا الْقَاضِيَ لِي مُكْرِمٌ فَرُبَّمَا جَلَسْتُ إِلَيْهِ فَقَالَ لِي وَ مَا يُؤْمِنُكَ أَنْ تَنْزِلَ اللَّعْنَةُ فَتَعُمَّ مَنْ فِي الْمَجْلِسِ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from one of our companions, from Muhammad Bin Muslim who said, 
‘Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> and Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> passed by me, and I was seated in the presence of the judge of Al-Medina. So I went over to him<sup>asws</sup> in the morning, so he<sup>asws</sup> said to me: ‘What sitting did I<sup>asws</sup> see you to be in, yesterday?’ I said, ‘May I be sacrificed for you<sup>asws</sup>! This judge is honourable to me, so sometimes I sit with him’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said to me: ‘And what would secure you if the Curse were to descend, so it would embrace (grip all) the ones in the gathering’
